Activity: Arrive, email check, and coffee. Browse interesting facts online.
Finalize the SQL queries for data extraction. Ensure all queries are accurate, efficient, and well-documented.
Execute the SQL queries on the production database to measure the baseline performance of each data quality metric.
Analyze the results of the data quality measurements. Identify areas where data quality is particularly low.
Prepare a presentation summarizing the baseline data quality measurements and highlighting areas for improvement.
Lunch Break: Get lunch with team members.
Email @itpm-1 and @clinlead-1 to schedule a presentation of the findings and get buy-in on setting weekly targets for improvement.
Research and brainstorm potential strategies for improving data quality in the identified areas. Consider process changes, training, and system modifications.
Draft a proposal outlining the proposed strategies for data quality improvement, including estimated costs and timelines.
Review the proposal. Prepare for presentation.
